column4: Hello does anybody here use NetBeans/IntelliJ IDEA? And please do not abuse me that I'm not just telling the problem, I just want to know if anybody can use this programs with Java 6.
Are you by any chance experiencing the blank window bug?
No, I'm experiencig keyboard locks.
So you don't experience it ? keyboard locks
It works fine for me, once I worked around the bug I mentioned
What version of Java u have please ?
and what version of Ubuntu
and do you have something like Smart Common Input Method installed ?
I'm runing both Gutsy and Feisty on separate machines
That's the software for CJK input, itsn't it? Unless it's installed by default, I don't have
yes, it's installed by default. hmm, strange, at least now I know that it isn't bug in Java :(
Well, I don't use it, unless it's doing something behind the scenes that I don't know about
But it runs by default, doesn't it (is this prope ? :)
bad type
I really don't know about SCIM; If I understand correctly, it deals with languages I don't know
Yes, I also don't know anything about it. I just found some information that it has something to do with SCIM. But it is installed and run by default so maybe it isn't true.
what version of intellij idea/netbeans do you use please?
I tried a beta version of netbeans, but I don't use it anymore since I didn't like it
i just want to know if you use some swing/awt ide (or any other application), not eclipse. it happens just in swing/awt applicaions to me
That's the only Java app I have. I generally stay as far from Java as I can
or had
ok, thank you
